interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Charlotte Rampling: The Look
Review Date: 2017/05/27
Store: Charlotte Rampling  (Actor),     Angelina Maccarone  (Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Documentary
Product Description: ['A biographical study of legendary actress Charlotte Rampling (Babylon A.D., Swimming Pool), told through her own conversations with artist friends and collaborators, including Peter Lindbergh, Paul Auster, and Juergen Teller. Intercut with footage from some of Rampling\'s most famous films, this "self-portrait through others" is a revealing look at one of our most iconic screen stars.']
Average Rating: 3.9

Review Text: Absolutely amazing film. If you are a fan of Charlotte Rampling, you'll love it, of course. But what she has to say has significance far beyond her own life. A must-see.
